headline: Why AIG (AIG) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of global insurance giant AIG (NYSE:AIG) fell 3.3% in the afternoon session after a significantly weaker-than-expected U.S. jobs report sparked concerns about the health of the economy. According to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, non-farm payrolls increased by only 22,000 in August, a figure substantially below expectations. This disappointing data suggests a potential slowdown in economic activity. For a major insurance and financial services provider like AIG, a cooling economy ca
